content: learn how to crochet a dazzling granny star blanket in this quick cozy tutorial stitch by stitch you ll bring stunning stars to life perfect for snuggling or gifting make it any size from a christmas placemat to a king-size bed free written pattern and video tutorial available free written pattern https //www crochetwithclare com/crochet-granny-star-blanket html video tutorial https //youtu be/kc2bngmf_k0 si=ijba894hnyzjbch1
